## RedeemableERC20.isReceiver property

Check that an address is a receiver. A sender is also a receiver.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly isReceiver: (maybeReceiver: string, overrides?: ReadTxOverrides) => Promise<boolean>;
```
